Parameter: recovery times from maximum block to 50% recovery
Sentece: In these experiments, the recovery times from maximum block to 50% recovery of control twitch height were significantly longer with mivacurium than with atracurium (mean 25.2(SD 4.7) versus 22.6(3.1) min, p < 0.01).
Title: Discrepancy of recovery times related to potency between atracurium and mivacurium simultaneously administered in isolated forearms.
Name: Mivacurium
